      • onDatasourceColorChanged

        public void onDatasourceColorChanged(DataDef dataDef,
                                     DataDefAdapter.DataDefViewHolder viewHolder)
        Description copied from interface: DatasourcesPresenter
        Called when the color of a data definition should be changed. The method shall make necessary changes in the underlying database layer.
        Specified by:
        onDatasourceColorChanged in interface DatasourcesPresenter
        Parameters:
        dataDef - The data definition whose color to change.
        viewHolder - The viewholder object associated with the data definition. It is passed in so that the method may change the color of the color view. This would probably be better to have as a method of the view, but oh well.
